description: Whiskey Sockets Baileys Whatsapp bot By joeljamestech

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here.get session id from here, https://joel-xmd-pair-joelbot-d392f3b60559.herokuapp.com/

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the owner number for bot.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

OWNER_REACT.description: Make it true if you want reactions on your number

ANTI_DELETE.description: MAKE IT TRUE IF YOU WANT TO RECOVER DELETED MSGS

DELETE_PATH.description: YOUR ACCORDING IF YOU WANT TO SEND DELETED MSG WHERE SAME OR PM.
